installed-main__block-1__paragraph-1.message: Hi from the Adblock Plus team. Thank you for installing Adblock Plus!

installed-main__block-2__paragraph-1.message: Adblock Plus is honor-ware, which means we trust each other to be nice:

installed-main__block-2__item-1.message: You pay what you can afford for Adblock Plus. We let you choose the price.

installed-main__block-2__item-2.message: We develop features that put you in control of your browsing experience.

installed-main__block-2__item-3.message: You get a refund - and you can keep Adblock Plus - if you don’t love it.

installed-main__block-5__item-2.message: From 8am to 5pm you can email us on our portal

installed-main__block-4__paragraph-1.message: Adblock Plus started blocking intrusive ads the moment it was installed. While we block the vast majority of ads, we understand that many sites rely on advertising, which is why we allow certain ads, by default, as long as they meet our strict criteria. If you want to turn off this option, please visit your settings and turn off Acceptable Ads anytime.

installed-main__block-6__paragraph-1.message: Enjoy a better browsing experience with Adblock Plus Premium and block distractions like cookie banners, floating videos, survey requests, and more. Sign up for Adblock Plus Premium today!

installed-main__block-5__paragraph-1.message: We are here to support you around the clock on our support portal at help.adblockplus.org.

installed-footer__block-1__paragraph-1.message: Adblock Plus blocks web ads on mobile devices, too! Get Adblock Plus for iOS in the App Store or Adblock Plus for Samsung Internet in Google Play.

installed-footer__block-2__paragraph-1.message: Copyright © 2023 All rights reserved. Adblock Plus® is a registered trademark of eyeo GmbH - Privacy Policy

installed-main__block-4__paragraph-2.message: In order to provide the best possible user experience, the Adblock Plus extension collects some user data by default. You can choose to opt-out of data collection here.
